author: protolambda
content: It was hitting memory limits due to JVM being too eager. Tuning JVM memory limit, removing keystore lockfiles (prevented the automated restarts, eth2stats client entries are live but not updating due to restart fails), and restarting. Hope to have Teku back soon ðŸ™‚

content: It may be stopping because of another reason, memory limit changes didn't help. Investigating...

author: protolambda
content: Teku is back in the game. Fun configuration issue on our end: allocated a lot to the JVM heap, but (afaik) should have left more buffer for non-java buffers (network, rocksdb, etc.).
